attributes.action: Make Adultry for men and women a criminal offence punished by Castration or female circumsition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Adultry was actually a law punished by castration or female circumsition. This would put people off doing it and would also save goverment endless divorce fees paid by legal aid.This punishment would also cost alot less than prison.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
